data.title: Oströmisches Reich 1096-1204 by [BYZANTINE EMPIRE - MAP]. SPRUNER, KARL AND MENKE, THEODOR.: (1876)
data.meta_description: Justus Perthes, Gotha - 1876 - Map with original colour and outline hand-colour, 32.2 x 40 cm, text in German, four inset maps, central fold, slight marginal toning, and spotting on the verso, but in very good condition. A most handsome and highly detailed map detailing the Eastern provinces of the Byzantine/Roman Empire before the Fourth Crusade. The inset maps depict Constantinople, Divisions of the Empire, and Antioch, issued for the "Hand-Atlas für die Geschichte des Mittelatters und die Neueren Zeit" - Oströmisches Reich 1096-1204
data.text:
Shipping Terms:

The shipping prices quoted on ABEBooks reflect what we have found to be the "average book". Of course in reality there are many books that do not weigh what an "average book" weighs so there are times when we need to requote shipping, just as there are times when we are in position to refund some of the shipping. Please rest assured we try to get your order to you for a reasonable price, as quickly and as well packed (we carefully pack all of our parcels in book boxes) as possible.
